passive.name: Capriciousness
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. At the start of the battle, the wearer gains Mask, lasting for {{6}} turn(s). While the wearer has Mask, the wearer's allies have their CRIT Rate increased by <orangeStrong>{{5}}%</orangeStrong> and their CRIT DMG increased by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer recovers (including Skill Points that exceed the limit), they gain 1 stack of Radiant Flame. And when the wearer has {{4}} stacks of Radiant Flame, all the stacks are removed, and they gain Mask, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).
